Data Fields
CSL_EpwmTimebaseCfg Struct Reference
IP » EPWM

Structure holding the TimeBase sub-module configuration parameters. More...

#include <csl_epwm.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t tbClk
 
uint32_t pwmtbCounterFreqPrd
 
uint32_t tbCntrDirection

uint32_t cntDirAfterSync
 
uint32_t phsCountAfterSync
 
uint32_t syncOutSrc
 

Detailed Description

Structure holding the TimeBase sub-module configuration parameters.

Field Documentation

uint32_t CSL_EpwmTimebaseCfg::cntDirAfterSync

Direction of the counter after the sync event is occurred. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmTbCntDirAftSync_t.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmTimebaseCfg::enableSynchronization

Enable synchronization inside the timebase sub-module. This can take following two values TRUE or FALSE.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmTimebaseCfg::phsCountAfterSync

Value of the phase counter to be loaded after the sync event.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmTimebaseCfg::pwmtbCounterFreqPrd

PWM Time base counter Frequency/Period.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmTimebaseCfg::syncOutSrc

Source of synchronization output signal. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmTbSyncOutEvt_t.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmTimebaseCfg::tbClk

Time base clock.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmTimebaseCfg::tbCntrDirection

Time base counter direction. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmTbCounterDir_t.
